department.dept_long_name: Department of Romance Languages and Literatures

course.title: Tutorial-Junior Year
course.faculty_text: Mariano Siskind and members of the Department
course.description: Weekly individual instruction for juniors pursuing a thesis honors track in Latin American Studies, culminating in the writing of a 20-25 page research paper in either Spanish or Portuguese.
course.notes: Successful completion of one term of Latin American Studies 98 (or equivalent) is required of all thesis-track honors concentrators in Latin American Studies in their junior year.
